name: RUSSIAN FIGHT SIMULATOR
description:
The most realistic combat simulator in Russia. Destroy your opponents to become the best on the map!



Distinctive features:

  • Character customization system, put on a hat and show your originality
  • Choose a character you like, each has its pros and cons.
  • Several unique battle maps
  • Multiplayer! Rather invite your friends and find out who is the best among you!
